Package lapr.model

Class PaymentScheduler

java.lang.Object
lapr.model.PaymentScheduler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class PaymentScheduler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Class responsible for scheduling a task to automatically pay the transactions of an organization.
